# bunny_pullzone_optimizer_class (Resource)

Pullzone Optimizer Image Class

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "bunny_pullzone" "test" {
  name = "test"

  origin {
    type = "OriginUrl"
    url  = "https://192.0.2.1"
  }
}

resource "bunny_pullzone_optimizer_class" "thumbnail" {
  pullzone = bunny_pullzone.test.id
  name     = "thumbnail"

  width      = 200
  height     = 300
  brightness = 15
}
```

### Required

- `name` (String)
- `pullzone` (Number)

- `blur` (Number)

- `hue` (Number)
- `quality` (Number)

- `sepia` (Number)
